messages.message:
I agree. What angle do you think would be the best for us? Two I see would be:

- our equivalent writeup. Same basic message, tailored for our architecture, approach, etc. (I believe @Dylan has some detailed diagrams along this line)
â€¢ referencing that article in our post and using it an example of all of the things we make it so you don't have to worry about
In the latter case, not as a slight against Amazon, but rather as a published reference point of just how much work there is to do for a production pipeline of this category -- that we save you.

Excellent.

As a customer facing document, certainly I would recommend option #1 - Instabase recommended architecture to solve "document processing" or similar.  Then we can create competitive mis-conception talking points from it for our sales playbook. @Ted
The quick way to get this sort of content out is via our Blog, and we can later re-purpose the content into our website in the support/guides/solutions etc. section of our pages
@Ted would love to collab with you on this.
